comments.body:
Per our discussion: this change should be applied to all of the scroll behaviors, since ScrollConfiguration produces OverscrollWhenScrollableBehavior by default but not unconditionally.

For the benefit of someone reading this code years from now, it might be good to explain the rationale for the double.INFINITY. We don't want to cause a scrollable's initial scroll offset, to be inadvertently clipped before a valid contentExtent is computed.
